channel.title: Simple client run problem
channel.description:
Well i have this problem that i cant solve ... I added the cache to the right folder, etc everything done. But when im going to run the x64 client i get this weird error: [img]http://gyazo.com/2f261575c215188a547dcebc6fa0038a.png?1333647244[/img] Heres: [code]@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/code]
I also tried to change "Xmx1024x" to "Xmx512" and i still cant get it work. My java is also at the right path so.. I dont know what i really can do.

item.title: Simple client run problem
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

it depends if your java is Jdk 1.7.0_3 or if its JDK6. if your java is 1.7 and your environemntal variables path is set to JDK6 then you have to change it. if you dont know how to get to environmental variables i can help with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple client run problem
item.dc:creator: @Rilex Rilex
item.description:
@Rilex wrote:

[quote=“dsdodson95, post:4, topic:438580”][quote author=Rilex link=topic=541289.msg3965175#msg3965175 date=1333648575]

What language is that?
Also, wrong section.

It’s Swedish and it means " Press any key to continue…"
Why?
[/quote]

I’m still getting the same error somehow.

Try:

@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause [/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Simple client run problem
item.dc:creator: @dsdodson95 dsdodson95
item.description:
@dsdodson95 wrote:

[quote=“Rilex, post:3, topic:438580”][quote author=dsdodson95 link=topic=541289.msg3965173#msg3965173 date=1333648320]
What language is that?
Also, wrong section.
[/quote]
It’s Swedish and it means " Press any key to continue…"
Why?[/quote]

Try:

@echo off
title Client
cd bin
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaw.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Simple client run problem
item.dc:creator: @Rilex Rilex
item.description:
@Rilex wrote:

Well i have this problem that i cant solve …
I added the cache to the right folder, etc everything done.
But when im going to run the x64 client i get this weird error:

Heres:

@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

I also tried to change “Xmx1024x” to “Xmx512” and i still cant get it work.
My java is also at the right path so…
I dont know what i really can do.
